original_text: And Judah gathered themselves together, to ask help of the Lord: even out of all the cities of Judah they came to seek the Lord.
korean_text: 유다 사람이 여호와께 도우심을 구하려 하여 유다 모든 성읍에서 모여와서 여호와께 간구하더라

sentences.original_text: to ask help of the Lord
even out of all the cities of Judah
they came to seek the Lord
